subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Miami forward Alexander Johnson is expected to miss Sunday’s game with the Detroit Pistons because of a concussion sustained in a collision with his teammate Mark Blount in the Heat’s 109-95 loss at Washington on Friday. He was evaluated at George Washington University Hospital and cleared to fly home.
